const Joi = require('joi');

const EntityIdDto = Joi.number()
    .integer()
    .positive();

module.exports = EntityIdDto;

/**
 * @license
 * Copyright CERN and copyright holders of ALICE O2. This software is
 * distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License v3 (GPL
 * Version 3), copied verbatim in the file "COPYING".
 *
 * See http://alice-o2.web.cern.ch/license for full licensing information.
 *
 * In applying this license CERN does not waive the privileges and immunities
 * granted to it by virtue of its status as an Intergovernmental Organization
 * or submit itself to any jurisdiction.
 */

const Joi = require('joi');

const FileDto = Joi.object({
    mimetype: Joi.string().required(),
    filename: Joi.string().required().min(3),
    fieldname: Joi.string().required().min(3),
    originalname: Joi.string().required().min(3),
    encoding: Joi.string().required(),
    size: Joi.number().required(),
    destination: Joi.string(),
    path: Joi.string().required(),
});

module.exports = FileDto;

/**
 * @license
 * Copyright CERN and copyright holders of ALICE O2. This software is
 * distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License v3 (GPL
 * Version 3), copied verbatim in the file "COPYING".
 *
 * See http://alice-o2.web.cern.ch/license for full licensing information.
 *
 * In applying this license CERN does not waive the privileges and immunities
 * granted to it by virtue of its status as an Intergovernmental Organization
 * or submit itself to any jurisdiction.
 */

const Joi = require('joi');

const PaginationDto = Joi.object({
    limit: Joi.number()
        .integer()
        .min(1)
        .max(100),
    offset: Joi.number()
        .integer()
        .min(0),
});

module.exports = PaginationDto;

/**
 * @license
 * Copyright CERN and copyright holders of ALICE O2. This software is
 * distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License v3 (GPL
 * Version 3), copied verbatim in the file "COPYING".
 *
 * See http://alice-o2.web.cern.ch/license for full licensing information.
 *
 * In applying this license CERN does not waive the privileges and immunities
 * granted to it by virtue of its status as an Intergovernmental Organization
 * or submit itself to any jurisdiction.
 */

const application = require('./application');

application.run();

/*
 * 'SIGTERM' and 'SIGINT' have default handlers on non-Windows platforms that reset the terminal mode before exiting
 * with code 128 + signal number. If one of these signals has a listener installed, its default behavior will be removed
 * (Node.js will no longer exit).
 */
['SIGTERM', 'SIGINT', 'SIGHUP'].forEach((event) => process.on(event, application.stop.bind(application)));

import { h } from '/js/src/index.js';

/**
 * Returns the author filter component
 * @param {Object} model The global model object
 * @return {vnode} A text box that lets the user look for logs with a specific author
 */
const authorFilter = (model) => h('input.w-75.mt1', {
    type: 'text',
    id: 'authorFilterText',
    value: model.logs.getAuthorFilter(),
    oninput: (e) => model.logs.setAuthorFilter(e.target.value),
}, '');

export default authorFilter;

import { h } from '/js/src/index.js';
import headers from './headers.js';
import rows from './rows.js';

/**
 * Renders the table
 * @param {Array} data An object array, with every object representing a to be rendered row
 * @param {Object} keys The full collection of API keys and their corresponding header values
 * @param {Object} model The global model object
 * @param {Function} params Additional element parameters, wrapped in a function
 * @param {String} cssClass string
 * @returns {vnode} Return the total view of the table to rendered
 */
const table = (data, keys, model, params = () => null, cssClass) => h('table.table.table-hover.shadow-level1', [
    headers(keys, model),
    rows(data, keys, model, params, cssClass),
]);

export default table;

import { h } from '/js/src/index.js';

/**
 * Generic page loading placeholder.
 *
 * @param {number} size The size of the spinner.
 * @return {vnode} The spinner.
 */
const spinner = ({ size = 10, absolute = true } = {}) =>
    h(`.w-100.flex-row.justify-center.items-center${absolute ? '.absolute-fill' : ''}`, [
        h('span.pageLoading', {
            style: `font-size: ${size}em;`,
        }, h('.atom-spinner', h('.spinner-inner', [
            h('.spinner-line'),
            h('.spinner-line'),
            h('.spinner-line'),
            h('.spinner-circle', h('div', '●')),
        ]))),
    ]);

export default spinner;
